title: Google will know which companies you've given your email address to, then show you their ads
text:
Google will know which companies you've given your email address to, then show you their ads 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
Google has plans to know you even better. Customer Match will allow companies to upload your email address to Google, bringing advertisers "...
